column6: Ensure 'local username and password' is set
Ensure known default accounts do not exist
Ensure 'aaa authentication ssh console' is configured correctly
Ensure 'aaa command authorization' is configured correctly
Ensure 'aaa authorization exec' is configured correctly
Ensure 'aaa command accounting' is configured correctly
Ensure 'aaa accounting for SSH' is configured correctly
Ensure 'aaa accounting for EXEC mode' is configured correctly
Ensure 'RSA key pair' is greater than or equal to 2048 bits
Ensure 'SCP protocol' is set to Enable for files transfers
Ensure 'TLS 1.0' is set for HTTPS access
Ensure 'SSL AES 256 encryption' is set for HTTPS access
Ensure 'SSH session timeout' is less than or equal to '5' minutes
Ensure 'NTP authentication key' is configured correctly
Ensure 'logging to Serial console' is disabled
Ensure 'logging with the device ID' is configured correctly
Ensure 'syslog logging facility' is equal to '23'
Ensure email logging is configured for critical to emergency
Ensure 'snmp-server group' is set to 'v3 priv'
Ensure 'snmp-server user' is set to 'v3 auth SHA'
Ensure 'SNMP community string' is not the default string
Ensure 'noproxyarp' is enabled for untrusted interfaces
Ensure DHCP services are disabled for untrusted interfaces
Ensure ICMP is restricted for untrusted interfaces
Ensure DNS services are configured correctly
Ensure intrusion prevention is enabled for untrusted interfaces
Ensure packet fragments are restricted for untrusted interfaces
Ensure DOS protection is enabled for untrusted interfaces
Ensure 'ip verify' is set to 'reverse-path' for untrusted interfaces
Ensure 'security-level' is set to '0' for Internet-facing interface
Ensure Botnet protection is enabled for untrusted interfaces
Ensure Java applet filtering is enabled
Ensure explicit deny in access lists is configured correctly
Local Authentication, Authorization and Accounting (AAA) Rules
Local Authentication, Authorization and Accounting (AAA) Rules
Set 'transport input ssh' for 'line vty' connections
Set 'exec-timeout' less than or equal to 10 minutes 'line tty'
Set 'exec-timeout' to less than or equal to 10 minutes 'line vty'
Set 'username secret' for all local users
Set 'no snmp-server' to disable SNMP when unused
Do not set 'RW' for any 'snmp-server community'
Set the ACL for each 'snmp-server community'
Create an 'access-list' for use with SNMP
Set 'priv' for each 'snmp-server group' using SNMPv3
Set maximum value for 'ip ssh authentication-retries'
Set 'ip tftp source-interface' to the Loopback Interface
Set inbound 'ip access-group' on the External Interface
Ensure 'Password Strength' is Strong for configured 'User Names'
Ensure the 'CLI Login Timeout (minutes)' is less than or equal to 5
Delete the 'SNMP v3 User Name' default
Configure 'an authorized IP Address' for 'Logging Syslog Host'
Configure 'an authorized IP Address' for 'NTP Server'
Ensure 'Rogue Location Discovery Protocol' is enabled
Ensure 'Control Path Rate Limiting' is enabled
